text: Lori Wilson (February 15, 1937 â€“ January 30, 2019) was an American lawyer and politician. She was born in Waynesville, North Carolina. She was an Independent. Wilson was on the Florida Senate from 1973 to 1978. Wilson died at her daughter's Indian Harbour Beach, Florida home on January 30, 2019 from complications of dementia, aged 81. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from dementia Category:Disease-related deaths in Florida Category:Lawyers from North Carolina Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Independent politicians in the United States Category:Lawyers from Florida
title: Lori Wilson
